raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Replaced `got` HTTP client with native `fetch` API across multiple scripts
- Updated error handling to check HTTP status codes explicitly
- Modified redirect processing to use `fetch`'s `redirect: 'manual'` and header-based location parsing
- Adapted response body/text extraction to match `fetch` semantics
- Removed `got` imports and dependencies
